article: Mr. Smith argued with his wife. He was very  angry with  her, and she was  _  very angry with her husband. For  a few  days they didn't  talked to  each other at all. One evening Mr. Smith was very tired when he came back from his office.  As usual  he said nothing to his wife. After supper, Mr. Smith went upstairs and Mrs. Smith washed the dishes and  _  some sewing. When she went up to bed, she found her husband had fallen  asleep  . On her bed, she saw a piece of paper, on it  _  the words, "Mother,  wake me up  at 7 o'clock tomorrow morning. Father." When Mr. Smith woke up the next morning, it was nearly 8 o'clock. On the small table near his bed he saw  another  piece of paper. He took it and read these words. "Father, wake up. It's 7 o'clock now. Mother."
